description: [Meteor](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0688) can attempt to uninstall Kaspersky Antivirus or remove the Kaspersky license; it can also add all files and folders related to the attack to the Windows Defender exclusion list.(Citation: Check Point Meteor Aug 2021)

external_references.description: Check Point Research Team. (2021, August 14). Indra - Hackers Behind Recent Attacks on Iran. Retrieved February 17, 2022.
